channel.title: announcement on Earl Family Art Glass
channel.description: Recent content in announcement on Earl Family Art Glass

item.title: Our website has launched!
item.description: Welcome to our website! You should be able to find everything related to Earl Family Art Glass here. We will announce when we go to events and a number of other things on the news section of the site. In addition to that, you will be able to purchase art glass directly from the website.
